LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_LightMachineGun.label: full-power rifle bullet
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.label: Mech AMR
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.description:
A high caliber sniper rifle made to be used by MS-4E Jadger automatroids to destroy armored target at long ranges.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_AntiMaterialRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.label: Mech Assault Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.description:
An easily mass produced assault rifle designed for mech soldiers equipped with an extra long picatinny rail for all tacticool needs.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Assault Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultShotgun.label: Mech Assault Shotgun
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultShotgun.description:
A fully automatic shotgun able to be mass produced with stamped components.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_AutomaticGrenadeLauncher.label: Mech Grenade Launcher
LanguageData.DMS_AutomaticGrenadeLauncher.description:
A handheld automatic grenade launcher for clearing out clustered targets.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_BattleRifle.label: Mech Battle Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_BattleRifle.description:
A battle rifle built for mech soldiers intended for mech to mech combat.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_BattleRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_BattleRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_BattleRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Battle Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGun.label: Mech LMG
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGun.description:
A weapon specializing in supression chambered in a large caliber rifle round.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_LightMachineGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_MarksmanRifle.label: Mech Marksman Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_MarksmanRifle.description:
An automatic rifle with a free floating barrel to improve accuracy over a distance. Comes equipped from the factory with a three-round-burst option.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_MarksmanRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_MarksmanRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_MarksmanRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Marksman Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_SemiAutoRifle.label: Mech Semiauto Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_SemiAutoRifle.description:
A gas blowback semi-automatic rifle used by mech soldiers.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
LanguageData.DMS_SemiAutoRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SemiAutoRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SemiAutoRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Semiauto Rifle
LanguageData.DMS_SniperGrenadeLauncher.label: Sniper Grenade Launcher
LanguageData.DMS_SniperGrenadeLauncher.description:
A precision grenade launcher designed to serve as a counter-sniper.
This weapon is specially designed for automatroid use, normal humans will struggle to use it without external equipment or augmentations.
